name: Muaath bots
description: Useful PHP Telegram bots hosted in free Heroku

PAYMENT_BOT_PROVIDER_TOKEN.description: Telegram payment provider token obtained via https://t.me/BotFather

PAYMENT_BOT_LOGS_CHAT_ID.description: The username of public group/channel, Otherwise ID of private chat/group/channel.

DEV_USERNAME.description: The username of the creator or main editor of the bots, Not owner, Without @ in the start

BOTS_CHANNEL.description: The username of Bot channel in Telegram, Don't add @ in the start

BOTS_GROUP.description: The username of Bot channel in Telegram, Don't add @ in the start
